en: Peppa's playgroup are going to put on a play.
zh: 佩奇的幼儿园要演舞台剧了。

en: All the children have parts in the play.
They have to practice at home.
Peppa is going to be the Little Red Riding Hood.
zh: 佩奇要饰演的是小红帽。

en: Mummy Pig has made her costume.
Daddy Pig is helping Peppa practice.
zh: 猪爸爸正在帮佩奇练习。

en: Okay, Peppa, what do you say?
I'm going to visit my grandma!"
I'm going to visit my grandma!
Danny Dog is going to play the Big Bad Wolf.
Granddad Dog and Mummy Dog are helping him practice.
zh: 丹尼的爷爷和妈妈正在帮他练习。

en: You should be a bit scarier.
zh: 你应该表现得吓人一点。

en: I'm going to eat you all up!
Pedro Pony is going to play the Hunter.
zh: 小马佩德罗来扮演猎人。

en: He will rescue Peppa from the Big Bad Wolf.
zh: 他会从大灰狼手中拯救佩奇。

en: Neigh, you say,"I'm going to chase you away, you Big Bad Wolf!"
zh: 嘶~，你要说“我要把你赶跑，你这坏蛋大灰狼！”

en: Rebecca Rabbit is going to be the Grandma.
zh: 小兔瑞贝卡要扮演奶奶。

en: At the start of the play, you get locked in a cupboard by the Big Bad Wolf.
zh: 这出戏的开始，你被大灰狼锁进了柜子里边。

en: Then, right at the end of the play, you are rescued by the Hunter.
zh: 然后，在剧的最后，你被猎人拯救了。

en: Everyone has come to see the school play!
zh: 大家都来看学校舞台剧了。

en: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to our play,
zh: 女士们，先生们，欢迎来看我们的舞台剧，

en: First, let us meet the actors!
zh: 首先，请我们的演员上台！

en: Please, please! For the sake of the actors,
zh: 各位，各位！为了我们的小演员好，
我们的戏剧现在正式开始！
但是是谁来看望奶奶呢？

en: Woof woof! I'm the Big Bad Wolf.
Oh, dear. Danny has forgotten what he says next.
zh: 哦，糟糕了。丹尼忘记了下一句该说什么了。

en: Grandma, you must go in the cupboard.
zh: 奶奶，你得躲进柜子里边去。

en: The Big Bad Wolf is pretending to be Grandma!
zh: 现在大灰狼假装自己就是奶奶了！

en: I am Little Red Riding Hood.
I'm going to visit my grandma.
Daddy! You must not take photos!
zh: 爸爸！你不能在这里拍照片！

en: I'm going to visit my grandma.
Oh. You don't look like my grandma.
zh: 哦。你看上去不像是我的奶奶啊。

en: You are the Big Bad Wolf!
Just in time! Pedro the Hunter!
zh: 来得很及时啊！猎人佩德多！

en: Just in time! Pedro the Hunter!
zh: 来得很及时啊！猎人佩德多来了！

en: Pedro, would you like me to come on with you?
zh: 佩德罗，需要我跟着你吗？

en: You are a very naughty wolf.
zh: 你真是一只顽皮的大灰狼。

en: You were almost as good as me.
zh: 你演得几乎跟我一样好。
